title: Greg Miller Plays Witcher 3 - Kinda Funny Plays
description:
Greg plays about an hour of The Witcher 3 on PlayStation 4.

Subscribe! https://www.youtube.com/user/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get your PC here: http://www.ORIGINPC.com

Each and every day, Tim Gettys, Greg Miller, and Colin Moriarty get together to talk videogames. 

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation

Music by Rakohus!: http://www.youtube.com/user/rakohus

transcript_chunks.text: What's up everybody? Welcome to another let's play here on youtube.com/ KindaFunnyGames. I of course am Greg Miller and if you noticed it's I'm all alone. It's nighttimeish here. You you can't tell that cuz this this fake sun we put in the room makes it look like the same thing. But I've been looking over on KindaFunny.com/forums and over on our NeoGAF community thread and one of the big things we hear is you want longer let's plays . But the problem of course during the day is that we do the GameOverGreggy show the Kinda Funny Gamescast Colin & Greg Live normal emailing planning for E3 planning for Comic-Con planning for a million other things that doing let's plays every day means that it's hard to do really long ones often.
